text.0: the righteous singer shall oercome his enemies and he who serves the gods subdue the godless man.
text.1: the zealous man shall vanquish the invincible the worshipper share the food of him who worships not.
text.2: worship thou hero chase the arrogant afar put on auspicious courage for the fight with foes.
text.3: prepare oblation so that thou mayst have success we crave the favouring help of brahmaṇaspati.
text.4: he with his folk his house his family his sons gains booty for himself and with the heroes wealth.
text.5: who with oblation and a true believing heart serves brahmaṇaspati the father of the gods.
text.6: whoso hath honoured him with offerings rich in oil him brahmaṇaspati leads forward on his way.
text.7: saves him from sorrow frees him from his enemy and is his wonderful deliverer from woe.
